metadata.dc:title: Understanding Metadata

metadata.dc:description: Revision and expansion of Metedata made simpler: a guide for libraries published by NISO Press in 2001. Text (electronic monograph). Adobe Acrobat file: 159 KB, 20 p. Available in print versioni (16 leaves ; 28 cm.).
